description: It’s no surprise that the people of Portland just love Ziggy’s hand pies, as they’re handmade, filled with savory scrumptiousness, and baked to flaky, buttery perfection. You’ll find phenomenal fillings like…The Buffalo- chicken, Frank’s Red Hot Sauce, cheddar & mozzarellaThe NZ- shredded beef brisket, diced sweet onions, and thick gravyThai Pie- (vegetarian) spicy green coconut curry sauce, sweet onions, red & yellow peppers, and leekand more! You can also opt for any of these fillings to be piled high in a deep fried pizza cone- they call it the Ziggy Cone.And feel free to order up a side of Straight-Cut or Sweet Potato Fries with your pie, they’re both local favorites. So do a little jig over to this big ole truck and dig into some delicious Ziggy’s.
name: Ziggy's Food Truck
